title: Cindy Crawford: Magic City Marketplace
teaser: Now that Birmingham City Schools Superintendent Craig Witherspoon will resign at the end of the year, that leaves a key position in the community to be filled.  It's not just teachers, parents, and students who are concerned.  The business community will be watching this hire too.  We talk about that in this week's Magic City Marketplace.
